name: Outer Rim
description: Alert...Alertâ€¦ This is a distress message being sent from the outpost Praxis. At 2200 hours the Alliance outpost Praxis fell to enemy forces. The Empire's war machine is active and has initiated an act of war against the Alliance. We need pilots. We need your help. Will you defend the Outer Rim?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Later Processor: Dual Core Intel or AMD Processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated Graphics Card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 900 MB available space
